biotools.summary: Manual annotation of MS data for intact glycopeptides. It displays an interactive map of all theoretical glycopeptides that match the molecular masses of queried precursor ions. Ion matching can be performed in two modes: simple when the search space spans the combination of all tryptic peptides including N-glycosites in the human proteome, and advanced when the search space is custom-built by specifying peptides and glycans.

bioschemas.name: PepSweetener
